appTitle: One stop center for all your bills and payments.
signUpToContinue: Hi, Please sign up to continue
agreeTncText: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms and Conditions
forgotPasswordDesc: Enter the email address asscociated with your account and we will send you link to reset your password.
intro1Title: Accessible anytime, anywhere and on any device
intro1Body: Our app ensures seamless access, allowing you to connect and manage your activities effortlessly from any location and on any device, be it a smartphone, tablet, or desktop.
intro2Title: User and user role based access
intro2Body: Experience personalized and secure access with our user and role-based system, ensuring that each user has the appropriate permissions and functionalities tailored to their specific needs.
intro3Body: Keep track of all your transactions with our comprehensive history tracking feature, providing you with detailed records and easy-to-access information whenever you need it.
intro4Title: Easy search, review and pay option
intro4Body: Simplify your experience with our intuitive search, review, and payment options, designed to make finding, evaluating, and completing your transactions quick and effortless.
intro5Body: Enjoy the convenience of various payment methods, giving you the flexibility to choose the option that best suits your preferences and needs.
